projects.title: Website Curated for Djackets
projects.bodyText:
- Built an e-commerce website from scratch using Django backend and Vue.JS frontend
 -  Developed features to support authentication, ordering, cart, payment etc.
 - Integrated with Razorpay APIs to handle all the payments.

projects.title: Portal for Online prints
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a web application that allows students to place online print orders to the campus shop using Flask and SQLite.
 - Built features to support notifications, order status, cart etc.
 - Parsed the pdf documents using Python libraries to capture the image and text artifacts to arrive at a final cost.

projects.title: Football Match Notifier
projects.bodyText:
- Created an application using python standard library that sends push notifications about your favorite football teamâ€™s upcoming matches.
 - Used football-data.org API to mine match fixtures and team information.
